semantic_identifier: [GOLD-62]: Add diagnostics for missing/invalid Customer_Analyzer data in sales initiation recommendations
title: Add diagnostics for missing/invalid Customer_Analyzer data in sales initiation recommendations

sections.text: Instrument sales initiation recommendations to log and surface when required Customer_Analyzer inputs are missing or invalid (fit score, segment, positioning block) for an account at render time. Add a lightweight debug payload/tooltip (behind a feature flag) indicating which fields were used vs. which fallbacks were applied so SDRs/sales ops can understand unexpected ordering/template output. Include basic metrics for fallback rate to help validate the stability of the integration over time.
